document.full_text: residents of miami and its surrounding areas have been waking up this week to the sight of a smoky haze and a strong smell of burning blown eastwards by winds from a big wildfire raging in the everglades.
document.title: smoky haze from everglades fire blows over miami
lines_and_colors: residents of miami and its surrounding areas have been waking up this week to the sight of a smoky haze and a strong smell of burning blown eastwards by winds from a big wildfire raging in the everglades.
